Author: dragoono
Text: If this relationship is something you care about saving, which it sounds like you do, keeping secrets won't help. He feels like you're neglecting him, so explain how you aren't. Maybe he'll react bad, maybe he'll react better than you could've imagined, but it sounds like keeping your struggles a secret from him is only going to make things worse with time.

Author: budqueen12
Text: I did the same when I was with my ex. It was a short relationship, he felt I wasn't keen on him but really I thought he was so amazing and attractive I'd stress about getting slim and looking good for him which would result in me stress binge-eating every time I wanted to go see him. Then I'd bail, and feel so horrible, binge again, wake up bloated and still not want to see him because of how disgusting I felt. I's such a sad vicious cycle :( I totally understand you.
